episode.title: Administrator, Federal Aviation Administration v. Robertson

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in No. 74-450, the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration against Robertson.
And for reason stated in an opinion filed today with the clerk the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit is reversed.
Mr. Justice Stewart, with whom Mr. Justice Marshall joined, filed an opinion concurring in the judgment.
Mr. Justice Douglas and Mr. Justice Brennan filed a dissenting statement.
